Thank you for the outpouring of love and support I’ve received since announcing my positive test for #COVID-19. I continue to recover in isolation at home, am fever-free & feeling stronger each day, and my family remains healthy. Stay safe, #NorthamptonMA  https://t.co/Cx9ZvVhz5I
